text: Michel Subor (, born Mischa Subotzki; 2 February 1935 â€“ 17 January 2022) was a French actor. He was known for appearing in Jean-Luc Godard's second movie, Le petit soldat (1960). He also appeared in Alfred Hitchcock's Topaz. In 1999, he played Forestier in Beau Travail. Subor was born in Paris, France. Subor was killed in a car crash in Paris on 17 January 2022, aged 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Michel Subor
